name: Simulation & Model Explainer
tagline: Interprets complex simulation results and explains model behavior
overview: The Simulation & Model Explainer helps engineers understand and communicate complex simulation results. It interprets CFD, FEA, and system simulation outputs, identifies key findings, explains model behavior in plain language, and helps prepare results for design reviews.
whatItDoes: Summarizes key findings from simulation results
Identifies critical areas requiring attention (hot spots, stress concentrations)
Explains model behavior and parameter sensitivities
Generates presentation-ready summaries for design reviews
prompts: Summarize the thermal analysis results for this manifold design
What are the key stress concentrations I should focus on?
How do the results compare to the previous design iteration?
Explain why flow separation is occurring in this region
Prepare a summary of this CFD analysis for the design review
inputs: CFD simulation results and post-processing data
Model setup parameters and boundary conditions
guardrails: Assistive onlyâ€”simulation engineers validate all interpretations
Does not make design recommendations autonomously
Explanations based on physics principles, not speculation
Confidence levels indicate certainty of interpretations
Complex findings require expert review before communication
